E-Mail Messages
Date: Wednesday, 2/12/1989
Subject: Contract offer
You have to be kidding me with your offer.
Offer more money or I will not even think about it.

Regards,
Terry Frost Jr.



Date: Wednesday, 2/12/1989
Subject: I'll sign elsewhere
Sorry, Plum Grove has made the best overall offer.
I'll sign with them. Good luck this season!

Regards,
Terry Frost Jr.

Malibu GM



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1989
Subject: David Baeza learns new position
David Baeza has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Rightfield.
I would rate his skills as "E" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1989
Subject: Status of Tomas Sarachaga
Dear Sir,
Tomas Sarachaga has an AVG of .156 at AA !
That's definitely no good sign. I suggest demoting him soon.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Subject: Status of Mike Militello

you should demote him.

Regards,
Scouting Director
